dt: {bc}a ballroom dance for couples that resembles the quadrille
{bc}an elaborate dance with frequent changing of partners carried out under the leadership of one couple at formal balls

et: French {it}cotillon{/it}, literally, petticoat, from Old French, from {it}cote{/it} coat
shortdef: a ballroom dance for couples that resembles the quadrille
an elaborate dance with frequent changing of partners carried out under the leadership of one couple at formal balls
